<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ice Mummy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1885)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The cold of high places coupled with strong winds and less oxygen creates an effect that can preserve bodies, mummifying them through natural processes. Many are created deliberately by cults, and a rare few voluntarily transform.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Mummy_IceMummy.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Ice Mummy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1885)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Mummy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=228" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 131</row>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), snow vision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20); plus any two languages they knew while alive

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +18, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +5

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Snow Vision** The ice mummy ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from falling snow.

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +18 

</row>

**HP** 130
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10

**Weaknesses**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 10

**Great Despair** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) 30 feet. Living creatures are [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) while in an ice mummy's great despair aura. They can't naturally recover from this fear while in the area but recover instantly once they leave it. When a creature first enters the area, it must succeed at a DC 24 Will save (after taking the penalty from being frightened) or be [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) for 1d4 rounds. The creature is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +20 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 2d4+7 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold and cold rot

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d6+7 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold and cold rot

**Channel Rot**  ([Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) The ice mummy can deliver cold rot through melee weapons they wield.

**Cold Rot**  ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) This affliction can't be reduced below stage 1, nor can damage from it be healed, until successfully treated with [_remove curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=250) or a similar effect. The affliction can then be removed as normal for a disease. A creature killed by cold rot turns to ice crystals and can't be resurrected except by a 7th-level [_resurrect_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=20) ritual or similar magic; **Saving Throw** DC 24 Fortitude; **Stage 1** [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 round, then carrier with no ill effect (1 minute); **Stage 2** 5d6 negative damage plus 2d6 cold damage and [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 day)

**Frozen Breath** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The ice mummy exhales a 60-foot cone of razor-sharp ice that deals 5d6 cold and 4d6 slashing damage (DC 26 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The ice mummy can't use Frozen Breath again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Frozen in Time</title>

Cults that prepare ice mummies first dehydrate the victim, then take them to the top of a mountain or glacier for a gruesome ritual. The mummy-to-be is stripped naked and rubbed down with oil and fat infused with herbs. The skin is preserved for magical talismans or clothing. If the victim rises to undeath, it receives its own skin to wear.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-74" />
